about.pageParagraph1: Haixun Global Logistics (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd., headquartered in Shenzhen, China, provides global freight forwarding services for LCL, FCL, general cargo and bulk cargo via sea, land, and air.
about.pageParagraph2: Our services include booking, customs clearance, inspection, warehousing, distribution, door-to-door delivery and logistics planning.
about.pageParagraph3: With integrity, professionalism and speed as our core values, we deliver efficient logistics solutions trusted by global clients.
